title: Anyone have this problem
body: I rerolled Taric on aram and it took 2 rolls. Anyone else have a problem with losing both your rolls on aram?

replies.body: I've never heard of this happening before. Is it possible that you mistakenly double-clicked and used 2 rerolls that way? This is the only situation I can think of where 2 rerolls would be used.
This is what i'm thinking happened, was just wondering if it happened to anyone else. Thanks
If you're super unlucky maybe you rerolled Taric into Taric the first time.
